CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( IF ($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d", "/lightning/r/00O2x000003f539/view?fv0=", "/00O2x000003f539?pv0=") & Name, Deal_ID_Title__c &" Orders with Flight AddOn (POE) Report")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This report EXCLUDES any land activity-type of AddOns. It is to be used for any flight AddOn reporting ie. AE/SB, StopOver, Flight Upgrade
CustomField.label: Orders with Flight AddOns (POE) Report
